Harman's North Fork Cottages 2024 August 7 - 10

Our next trip.

Pre-Trip Messages

  • Dave - It’s that time again! Our annual West Virginia Harman’s Cabins Weekend! This year we will be welcoming a few new folks - some friends of Ryan and Kayla will be joining us. And a brand new person created by Jake and Kendall - Emma! Let’s give all our new friends a warm welcome! For our activity on Saturday this year, Ted is planning something different. We plan to stay on-property for fun and games right next to our cabins. We’ll have lunch at the newly completed pavilion (unless Harman’s rented it out without telling us) and do activities within sight of our group of cabins. Another new thing: Harman’s now requires 3 night rentals over weekends during busy periods. So we have all of our cabins this year starting Thursday. For those who cannot make it up Thursday, please continue to come up on Friday. But if you were on the fence, come on up a day early - the cabins are ours anyway! Another advantage to coming up Thursday is that it gives you all of Friday for unstructured activities of your own. We don’t start our schedule until the Friday evening Cookout
